title: Man found dead near CMCH
body: Police recovered the body of an unidentified man from outside the east gate of Chattogram Medical College Hospital yesterday morning. Locals found the man, aged approximately 65, lying beside the hospital's boundary wall and informed the police. Officers from the CMCH camp of Panchlaish Police Station went to the spot and took the body to CMCH's emergency department around 9:00am, where the on-duty doctor pronounced him dead, said Nurul Alam Ashik, sub-inspector and in-charge of the CMCH Police Camp. The body has been sent to the CMCH morgue for autopsy, he added. Local sources said the homeless, ailing man had long been living on the streets in the area. Police are trying to identify the body while the legal procedure is underway, he said.
